snippet: From the Southern chef Regina Charboneau, tricks and tips for an elaborate and elegant Thanksgiving dinner without endless hours in the kitchen.
abstract: Regina Charboneau, who will host 145 people at her Natchez, Miss, home for Thanksgiving, shares her tricks for creating elegant meal without endless hours of labor; recipes for butter biscuits with orange marmalade butter and sweet potatoes with cranberry-jalapeno chutney given.
lead_paragraph: From the Southern chef Regina Charboneau, tricks and tips for an elaborate and elegant Thanksgiving dinner without endless hours in the kitchen.

headline.seo: Thanksgiving Dinner Recipes and Tips from Regina Charboneau
headline.main: How to Dazzle Without the Frazzle
headline.print_headline: How to Dazzle Without the Frazzle
